price: Dios origina la creación y luego la reproduce, y ante Él regresarán.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
